REM ***** BASIC ***** option explicit
Sub SerienBriefVerteiler() Dim oTables as Object Dim oRecord_Kontakt as Object,oRecord1 as Object,sVorname as String Dim sDocumentID_mit_Praefix as String,sNummern as String,sKontakte as String,sAnrede as String Dim sName as String,sName1 as String,sName2 as String,sName3 as String,sName4 as String Dim sTelefon as String,sFunktelefon as String,sFax as String,sEMail as String,sTitel as String Dim iCount as integer,sSerienBriefVerteiler as String,sSerienBriefVerteilerOld as String,sKorrespondenzTyp as String Dim sSQL1 as String,sSQL2 as String,sSQL3 as String,iCountSerienbrief as Integer,sEmpfaenger as String,sEmpfaengerNr as String Dim vStatus as Variant
GlobalScope.BasicLibraries.LoadLibrary("ALADIN") sSerienBriefVerteiler="Datum: "& date iCountSerienbrief=1
sSQL1="select KontaktTyp,KorrespondenzTyp from "& sDrucker_TEMP(iUserID_lokal) oRecord1=oResult(sSQL1) While oRecord1.next() sKontakte=oRecord1.getString(1) sKorrespondenzTyp=oRecord1.getString(2) Wend
sSQL2="select distinct "&_ "t1.Document_Name,t1.DocumentID,t1.Anrede,t1.Body,t2.Name1,t2.Name2,"&_ "t2.Name3,t2.Name4,t2.Vorname,t2.Titel,t2.Anrede,t2.EMail,t2.Telefon,t2.Funktelefon,t2.Fax,t1.Erstellungsdatum,t3.NameKurz,t4.Serienbriefverteiler"&_ " from "& sDrucker_TEMP(iUserID_lokal) &" as t1,"& sKontakte &" as t2,Einstellungen as t3,"& sKorrespondenzTyp &" as t4"&_ " where t2.KontaktID = t1.KontaktID"&_ " AND t4.DocumentID=t1.DocumentID"&_ " AND t3.EinstellungsID = t1.EinstellungsID"
oRecord_Kontakt=oResult_Scroll(sSQL2) oRecord_Kontakt.absolute(iCountSerienbrief)
Do While fAnzahlSerienbriefe >= iCountSerienbrief oRecord_Kontakt=oResult_Scroll(sSQL2) oRecord_Kontakt.absolute(iCountSerienbrief)
sDocumentID_mit_Praefix=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(2) sName1=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(5) sName2=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(6) sName3=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(7) sName4=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(8) sVorname=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(9) sTitel=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(10) sAnrede=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(11) sEMail=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(12) sTelefon=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(13) sFunktelefon=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(14) sFax=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(15) sSerienBriefVerteilerOld=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(18)
sName="" sEmpfaenger="" sEmpfaengerNr="" if sAnrede <> "" then sName = sName + sAnrede + " " End if if sTitel <> "" then sName = sName + sTitel + " " End if if sVorname <> "" then sName = sName + fsConvertString(sVorname) & " " End if if sName1 <> "" then sName = sName & fsConvertString(sName1) End if if sName2 <> "" then sName = sName & ", " & fsConvertString(sName2) End if if sName3 <> "" then sName = sName & ", " & fsConvertString(sName3) End if if sName4 <> "" then sName = sName & ", " & fsConvertString(sName4) End if
sEmpfaenger=sName
if sTelefon <> "" then if Len(sEmpfaenger &" | Telefon: "& sTelefon) > 60 then sEmpfaengerNr=" Telefon: "& sTelefon else sEmpfaenger=sEmpfaenger &" | Telefon: "& sTelefon End if End if
if sFunktelefon <> "" then if Len(sEmpfaenger &" | Mobil: "& sFunktelefon) > 60 then if sEmpfaengerNr <> "" then sEmpfaengerNr=sEmpfaengerNr &" | Mobil: "& sFunktelefon else sEmpfaengerNr=" Mobil: "& sFunktelefon end if else sEmpfaenger=sEmpfaenger &" | Mobil: "& sFunktelefon end if End if
if sFax <> "" then if Len(sEmpfaenger &" | Fax: "& sFax) > 60 then if sEmpfaengerNr <> "" then sEmpfaengerNr=sEmpfaengerNr &" | Fax: "& sFax else sEmpfaengerNr=" Fax: "& sFax end if else sEmpfaenger=sEmpfaenger &" | Fax: "& sFax End if End if if sEmpfaengerNr <> "" then sEmpfaenger=sEmpfaenger &"\n"& sEmpfaengerNr end if
sSerienBriefVerteiler=sSerienBriefVerteiler &"\n"& sEmpfaenger
iCountSerienbrief=iCountSerienbrief+1 Loop
if sSerienBriefVerteilerOld <> "" then sSerienBriefVerteiler=sSerienBriefVerteilerOld &"\n\n"& sSerienBriefVerteiler End if
sSQL3="update "& sKorrespondenzTyp &" set SerienBriefVerteiler='"& sSerienBriefVerteiler &"' where DocumentID='"& sDocumentID_mit_Praefix &"'" SQL_execute(sSQL3) End Sub
